name: Path T
title: Pathological T
notes:
**Note 1:**  TNM does not include a Tis or TX category for melanoma of mucosa of head and neck sites. Tis and TX are mapped to NA and TNM stage group is derived as NA.

**Note 2:**  TNM does not include a T1 or T2 category for mucosal melanoma of head and neck sites.

**Note 3:**  Assign T3 for extension involving the mucosa only of adjacent sites.  Assign T4a or T4b for extension involving the deeper tissues of the primary or adjacent sites.

**Note 4:**  Assign T3 for localized tumor when no other information is available.
rows:
In situ, intraepithelial, noninvasive

Unknown; extension not stated
Primary tumor cannot be assessed
Not documented in patient record

Tumor limited to the epithelium and/or submucosa 
(mucosal disease)

Tumor confined to mucosa of left, right or both ethmoid sinus(es)

Confined to mucosa of ethmoid sinus, NOS

Extension involving mucosa only of nasal cavity including:
    Floor
    Lateral wall
    Nasal vestibule
    Nasal cavity, NOS
    Septum
    Turbinates

Extension to mucosa only of adjacent structures: 
    Frontal sinus
    Maxillary sinus
    Nasopharynx
    Sphenoid sinus

Localized, NOS

Stated as T3

Tumor invades deep soft tissue, cartilage, bone
or overlying skin

Extension to deep soft tissue of left, right, or both ethmoid sinus(es)
Soft tissue NOS
Extension to deep soft tissue of left or right ethmoid sinus or ethmoid sinus, NOS with mucosal involvement of structures in T3
Invasive tumor confined to either left, right, or both ethmoid sinus(es) with bony invasion 
(Involvement of perpendicular plate of ethmoid bone or ethmoid air cells)

Extension to deep tissues of adjacent  structures with or without bony invasion:
    Anterior orbital contents
    Frontal sinus
    Hard palate
    Maxillary sinus
    Medial wall or floor of orbit
    Nasopharynx
    Orbital plate
    Pterygoid plates
   Skin of cheek 
   Skin of nose
   Sphenoid sinus

Stated as T4a

Tumor invades any of the following:
Brain
Dura
Skull base
Lower cranial nerves (IX, X, XI, XII)
Masticator space
Carotid artery
Prevertebral space
Mediastinal structures

Anterior cranial fossa 
Base of skull
Clivus
Cribriform plate
Middle cranial fossa

Further contiguous extension :
    Carotid artery (encased)
   
Stated as T4b
